channel.title: Help with Npc List and Auto-Spawning
channel.description: Well first of all am using the sevrer [Mithscape 508] I need someone to help and explain how do I edit like the HP of a monster or the max hit and sutff like that; and if someone can make me an [auto-spawn] of all GWD like the center room with Aviansies and all the other monsters there and in each like place that you need to kill zamorak,sara,arma,bandos guys to kill the boss and the boss with his bodyguards w/e or explain me how does auto-spawn works. Greetings
